name: Isocube
desc: An isometric 3D render inspired by the artwork of M.C. Escher.

name: Snowball Fight
desc: Two snowmen having a friendly snowball fight. Designed and rendered in less than three hours for a speedart competition.

name: 3D Chess
desc: A surreal shot with chess pieces inspired by a vintage Windows background. Rendered on a 1999 Macintosh as part of a retro CGI project.

name: Grape Jellywave
desc: A vaporwave-esque statue rendered with a custom made grape jelly shader.

name: Shatter Sim
desc: A simulated computer graphic of a shattering statue. First test of the FLIP Fluids plug-in.

desc: Created for an art challenge, this piece depicts a creepy moth staring at a lightbulb.
